article.title: Thales-Raytheon to Provide Identification Friend or Foe Kits
article.text: Thales-Raytheon Systems Co., LLC, was awarded a $17,743,765 modification (P00008) to contract W31P4Q-13-C-0082 to exercise the option to acquire Sentinel Mode 5 Identification Friend or Foe kits and spares. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
